entities.name: floo network
entities.description: The Floo Network is a magical communication system that allows wizards to travel between locations instantly. It is mentioned as a means of warning someone not to come without being intercepted.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is standing outside Snape's classroom door, waving an official-looking piece of parchment and talking loudly. He mentions that Umbridge gave the Slytherin Quidditch team permission to continue playing.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts whose classroom door is near where Draco Malfoy is standing.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is someone who gave permission to the Slytherin Quidditch team to continue playing. She knows Draco's father.

entities.name: slytherin quidditch team
entities.description: The Slytherin Quidditch team was given permission by Umbridge to continue playing.

entities.name: potions
entities.description: Potions is a subject taught at Hogwarts that the three students are heading down to.

relationships.description: Draco Malfoy mentions that Umbridge gave permission to the Slytherin Quidditch team to continue playing.
The Slytherin Quidditch team received permission from Umbridge to continue playing.
